mapper.select: select DISTINCT sm.perms from t_user tu inner join sys_user_role sur on tu.user_id = sur.user_id inner join sys_role_menu srm on srm.role_id = sur.role_id inner join sys_menu sm on sm.menu_id = srm.menu_id where sm.del_flag = '0' and tu.del_flag = '0' and tu.USERNAME = #{username} and sm.perms <> ''
